document_data.name: ''Life Beneath the Sails''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Life Beneath the Sails''''' was a book of sea lore originally composed of three volumes of ships' logs, together forming a sizeable tome. It was written in the [[1369 DR|Year of the Gauntlet, 1369 DR]] by an anonymous author.{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}

It contained much information on maritime law, tradition, and superstition; helpful tips and homilies; stories short and long pertaining to the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]], as well as local sayings and curses. The library at [[Candlekeep]] was known to have a copy of all three volumes in their collection.
